creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Washburn and Miss Elisabeth Pope Washburn in memory of Mr. John Washburn
description: covered two-handled cup,  with elaborate floral design; the handles are formed of two female figures
inscription:
Mark

-On the side is engraved a coat of arms, unidentified, surrounded by crossed feathers.  Crest engraved on opposite side, beneath an earl\'s coronet.
markings:
Mark

- Fully marked on side near lip (date letter obscured).  Lion passant on udnerside of foot rim.

maker\'s mark: [S.A.] in monogram, mullet below
title: Two-handled cup
